summary: An aspiring actor with the inability to speak, joins forces with a man who has a powerful voice. Together they take the film industry by storm, but will their egos get in the way?
cast: Amitabh Bachchan|Dhanush|Akshara Haasan|Abhinaya|Pete Meads|Rukmini Vijayakumar|Shubham|Pratik|Sonamani|Rajeev|Ajay Jadhav|Asif Ali Beg|Ivan Rodrigues|Uday Tikekar|Pradeep Kuckreja|Abhimanyyu Abhimanyu|Nabeel Ahmed|Kalle Ahti|Javed Akhtar|Amin Ali|Khushboo Atre|Abhishek Bachchan|Greta Bagar|Anurag Basu|Lankesh Bhardwaj|Tanuj Bhatia|Kishore Bhatt|Mahesh Bhatt|Paul Blackwell|Martina Bosédé|Gioacchino Jim Cuffaro|Sonamoni Jayant Gadekar|Nigel Genis|Karim Hajee|Rajkumar Hirani|Ankur Jain|Amrita Jazzmyn|Jemiyah|Karan Johar|Abdul Hakim Joy|Rajesh Kalhan|Boney Kapoor|Ekta Kapoor|Rudra Kaushish|Mervi Koski|Tanuka Laghate|Sangya Lakhanpal|Preet Kaur Madhan|Rakeysh Omprakash Mehra|Gina Morrish|Mike Parish|Leah Perkins|Lesley Perkins|Felix Pring|Simi Rai|Rajeev Ravindranathan|Rekha|Harsh Dev Sharma|Vinita Sharma|Arun Shekhar|Rohit Shetty|Gauri Shinde|Ujjawal Gauraha Shiva|Peter Stanford|Mika Syvänen|Jarno Virtanen|Fiona Whitelaw|Miranda Wilson|Juha Wuolijoki|Amy Wyatt|Paul Redfern
title: Shamitabh
